name: Shoggoth Run
description:
How long can You survive?

Shoggoth Run is runner based on the Works of H.P. Lovecraft.

Run from the horror that lurks under the Antarctic ice

Instructions:

Collect stars to make dynamite appears, run and avoid obstacles and defend your self from the Shoggoth.

Desktop navigate with your mouse - use D to go right- A t go left -S to use your dynamite -P to pause - SPACE BAR to play or replay

Mobile Tap the items in the menu screens, hold your finger in the right side of the screen to go Right, the opposite to the left. Tap the Shoggoth to attack it.

Made with Construct 2
